privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
EarningSync values your privacy. We only collect information necessary to provide our services, such as your name, email, and account details. Your data is never sold or shared with third parties except as required to deliver our services or comply with legal obligations.
We do not store sensitive personal data. Information you provide is used only for communication and service delivery. We do not offer user accounts or portals that allow you to access or delete stored data.
For any questions about your privacy or data, please contact us at info@earningsync.com

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.content:
By accessing or using EarningSync, you agree to follow all applicable laws and these terms. Our services are provided for informational and educational purposes. You are responsible for your own trading decisions and account security.
EarningSync does not guarantee profits or prevent losses. Past performance is not indicative of future results. We reserve the right to update these terms at any time. Continued use of our services means you accept any changes.
If you have questions about these terms, contact us at info@earningsync.com

risk.title: Risk Warning
risk.content:
Trading and investing involve significant risk. You may lose more than your initial investment. EarningSync provides tools and information to help you make informed decisions, but we do not provide financial advice or guarantees.
All strategies, including EarningSync Classic and High Risk, carry the potential for both profit and loss. Past results do not guarantee future performance. Only trade with capital you can afford to lose and consider seeking independent advice if needed.
By using EarningSync, you acknowledge and accept these risks.

productsPage.title: Our Products
productsPage.desc: Discover our range of investment products designed for different risk appetites and goals.

slides.title: What is EarningSync Classic?
slides.desc: EarningSync Classic is a semi-automated strategy for USTEC (NASDAQ), GOLD, USOIL, and US30. It trades only buy-side, using strict risk and capital rules for steady, sustainable results. Designed to capture upside momentum with low risk, it's ideal for investors seeking stable returns.

slides.title: Trade Allocation & Risk Management
slides.desc:
• Lot Size Control: Max 0.05 lots per $1,000 balance for consistent, conservative sizing.
  • Focused Market Exposure: Only one symbol is traded at a time, no overlap between US30, GOLD, USTEC, or USOIL, to avoid overexposure and keep precision.

slides.title: Minimum Investment & Objective
slides.desc:
Minimum deposit: $100, accessible to a broad range of investors.
Objective: Generate stable annual income while preserving capital. Best for long-term investors seeking balanced, steady returns. Follows a strictly rule-based plan for consistent, emotion-free performance.

slides.title: Risk Disclosure
slides.desc: While the strategy is built with conservative exposure levels, it is not risk-free. The main risk arises if the NASDAQ index crashes more than 50% while all trades are fully allocated. Past performance is not a guarantee of future results, and market anomalies may still occur.

slides.title: What is EarningSync High-Risk?
slides.desc: At EarningSync High-Risk, we rely on an advanced trading strategy built around a custom indicator developed using Pine Script. This indicator generates precise trade signals that are executed automatically on a dedicated trading account, with continuous monitoring and control by our expert trading team.

slides.title: Instruments Traded
slides.desc:
• Gold (XAUUSD)
  • Dow Jones Index (US30)
  • Nasdaq Index (NAS100)
  • Bitcoin (BTCUSD)
The strategy focuses on these high-potential instruments, seeking to capture opportunities across diverse and volatile markets.

slides.title: Position Scaling & Risk Approach
slides.desc:
• We utilize a position-scaling approach to reach a favorable average entry price.
  • No stop-loss levels are applied, given the strategy’s nature and risk control mechanisms.
All trades are executed automatically and are under the vigilant supervision of our expert team, ensuring manual intervension when needed.

slides.title: Risk Disclosure
slides.desc: This strategy is high risk and is intended for experienced copy trading investors seeking aggressive growth. The absence of stop-losses and the use of position scaling can result in significant drawdowns or loss of capital. Only invest what you can afford to lose, and ensure you fully understand the risks involved.
